ygData.subject: Re: Get ready to battle
ygData.msgSnippet: I cannot raise a weapon against a fellow Predicon Phobias statement was firm and dirrect to the point. But I may still be able to assist you.If you would

"I cannot raise a weapon against a fellow Predicon" Phobias statement 
was firm and dirrect to the point.

"But I may still be able to assist you.If you would have some 
Maximals accompany me back to my ship I'll gine you the edge you need 
to fight this battle.all I ask is amnesty for any crimes I've 
performed in my line of duty to the Predicon cause."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster/Rex/Firearm/Striker/Prowl/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::
> 
> Kluster looks up from Phobia's info as the conference room doors 
> open, a Maximal officer stepping in.
> 
> "Sir," the Maximal says, "The scanners have picked up Predacon 
> signatures heading for the ship!"
> 
> Kluster nods, "Allright, Rex, get the base ready for an attack, 
I'll 
> call all the Maximals back."
> 
> "Yes sir," Rex says, walking out of the room.
> 
> Kluster activates his comm-link, "All Maximals," he says into 
> it, "Predacons are marching at the Cybertronian Fire. Everyone 
report 
> to base, and get ready to battle."
> 
> He turns to Phobia. "Will you assist us in this battle?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Internal repairs complete."
> 
> Firearm opens his eyes, trying to sit up. He can't, do to an object 
> laying over his chest. He lifts the object, a metal plate, and 
stands 
> up.
> 
> Firearm blinks a few times, trying to remember what had happened. 
He 
> seemed to remember fighting, but not much else. He rubs his head 
with 
> one hand, looking down at the cannon on his other hand that gave 
him 
> his name.
> 
> "Better find Kluster," he says, seconds later recieving his 
> commander's transmission. His walk turns into a jog as he heads to 
> the bridge.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker looks from Hot Rod to Primal, about to say something when 
> Kluster's tranmission comes in.
> 
> "You heard 'im," he says to the two bots, "Let's get moving."
> 
> He turns around, heading to the Cybertronian Fire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl sighs as Kluster's transmission comes in. He looks around at 
> the equipment he had gathered. He sighs again, the rescue would 
have 
> to wait. There was no point in rescuing Iron Raptor and Tavatron to 
> bring them back to a smoking base.
> 
> He exits the room, heading for the bridge.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramhorn and Smokescreen run out of the Ark as they recieve 
Kluster's 
> message, heading for the Cybertronian Fire.
